terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators
Class ScalePlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.TGGeometryPlugin
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.ScalePlugin
public class ScalePlugin
extends TGGeometryPlugin

A geometry plugin that performs geometric scaling. Scaling occurs in 3D relative to the target transform along its major axes.

Also provides a set of utilities for converting between 3D and and actuation values.

The input actuation value is defined as follows:

  • X - X axis scale factor.
  • Y - Y axis scale factor.
  • Z - Z axis scale factor.
  • W - (ignored)
